column5: Hey everyone,  Me, my gf, and her daughter (5) are heading up to wasaga beach tomorrow and was thinking for the evening maybe doing some fishing.  We were wondering if you guys can suggest a good shoreline area (we have no boat & don't wanna spend the money to rent one)  were we could fish nearby, maybe on lake simcoe or even right around wasaga.  We don't really need BIG GAME fish but would be nice to land some largemouths or smallies.  thanks.
You could fish off the causeway at lake Eugenia. It's not that far from Wasaga. Lots of decent bass to be had from shore there.
